frontmatter.author: amfoss
frontmatter.title: Gopa Vasanth invited for the Wikimedia Hackathon 2019 at Prague, Czech Republic
frontmatter.description: Our active member, Gopa Vasanth has been invited and fully-funded to participate in the Wikimedia Hackathon 2019 at Prague, Czech Republic

markdownRemark.html:
Our active member, Gopa Vasanth, a CSE sophomore, has been invited to participate in the annual Wikimedia Hackathon hosted by the Wikimedia Foundation at Prague, Czech Republic. The organisation, on seeing the passionate contributions Gopa has made, offered him a fully funded invite to participate in the Hackathon happening from 17 to 19 May 2019.

The Wikimedia Hackathon is a major event that brings together developers from all around the world to improve the technological infrastructure of Wikipedia and other Wikimedia projects, particularly the MediaWiki platform on which they are based, and other Wikimedia code development.
